tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
We waited almost 1 and half hour to see doctor .
I took appointment on 3.00 but I was attended on 4.40
When I asked in receiption for delay they told doctor is in seminar, it's ok if doctor is busy atleast for a courtesy for patient should have been informed much earlier so atleast patient can rest in home itself...

Otherwise the doctor was friendly n explained the health isuue correctly

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Will not recommend this doctor to any one. My mother visits him often due get her diabetic checked. *** ****** ** ***** My mother after fixing the appointment in the noon she visits him, to which the doctor says he is no mood to treat patients in the noon post lunch! I have never seen a doctor say this. ** *** ***** ***** * ******* **** ***** **** ****** **** **** **** **** ****** ******
Prescribed the same meds I had been taking for months. Made no effort to explain the possible reasons for allergy neither suggested any next steps

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Very polite and jovial. He is very empathetic and listens carefully before explaining it. His explanations are backed by logic.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,
review: Dr Dwijendra combines treatment with friendliness. He gives in depth explanations of health issue, with patience to handle Q&A at the end. Always has a smile on his face which helps reduce stress on patients. I rate him as An awesome doctor and wonderful human after visiting him for almost an year.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: **** **** ******* **** ********* , patient listening, addresses all the queries raised by the patient. Appropriate treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: He is very patient and predicts the cause of illness very easily .., And treats it very well ..u need not worry about the report because we strongly believe in treatment he provides
